alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:38PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER AND NORTH CENTRAL FALL RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM MDT... At 238 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles west of Pringle, or 10 miles south of Custer, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Pringle, Argyle, Wind Cave National Park, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Buffalo Corrals, Cold Brook Reservoir, and southeastern Custer State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
